description.displayText:
EXCELLENT ONE OF A KIND NANNY!

We unfortunately are leaving New York City and relocating to the suburbs and so have to say goodbye to our incredible nanny/second mom to our 1.5 year old son.

Lafleur has been caring for him since he was 3 months old. He absolutely adores her and we know he'll be devastated once we leave.  

Every morning/afternoon he gives her a huge hug, smiles and babbles.

We can't say enough good things about Lafleur, she came to us with 20 years of experience, excellent references and stood out amongst all the nannies we interviewed. She's trustworthy, reliable, patient, nurturing, diligent and amazing with newborns. We're never worried leaving home because we know our son is in great hands. She keeps our home spotless and perfectly organized.

She will be an excellent addition to your family.

We are more than happy to provide a great reference!
